alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 19 at 2:30AM MDT until June 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Great Falls MT has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. .A weather system will bring heavy rainfall to the area, which will cause the Gallatin river to rise to near flood stage. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Gallatin River at Logan. * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.8 feet, Water may be on small bridges and around railroad bridge footing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this afternoon. this afternoon at 230 PM MDT.
